video.description:
camgrangershoots.com/chain-heavy

BLACK LIVES MATTER.


Please watch with headphones. 

Part 1 of 3 of a series of films based on the abstracted retelling of stories of people from my hometown, Cleveland, Ohio. 

Chain fabricated by Tyler Davis. 

The biggest thank you in the world goes to;

Shakir Smith
Donte Woods
Ethan Schaefer 
Kaitlynn Frazier
Grace Bowen 
& Marisa Espe

If you enjoyed this piece, please take the time to listen to, and if you can, donate to the following causes. Your support means the world to me, and I know they'd appreciate it too.

WATER FOR FLINT - https://www.gofundme.com/waterforflint-wff
BLACK LIVES MATTER - https://donate.idex.org/checkout/donation?eid=66399

video.description:
camgrangershoots.com/blue-boy

In the quiet little town of Bad City, Boy Blue and his imaginary best friend Boy Black face homecoming on Thursday, and the apocalypse on Friday.

This is the last film in my college career, i'm still in awe of what we made here. Thanks for sticking it out with me, and keeping me sane through it all. I love you guys so much.

STARRING

Jake Mason Macklin
Destiny Strudwick
& Cudelice Brazelton

VFX Artist
Jon Rooney

Sound Operators
Jessica Kramer
Jamilla Kato
& Shakir Smith

Featuring The Music Of
Correy Parks - correyparks.com
Darien Fisher - soundcloud.com/iamdarien
Meg Paulsen - soundcloud.com/megpaulsen
Chance The Rapper - chanceraps.com
Poddington Bear - podingtonbear.com/
& Cyndi Lauper - cyndilauper.com/

Cover Art By Hana Mendel 

The Biggest Thanks In The World To The Following:
Mom & Byron
Gaga & Papa
Ms President, Chelsea Morgan, Ms Russo & Euclid High School
Bobby Swartzentruber & Gahanna High School
Lydia Rall, Heather Bray & Maria D'Apolito
Dana Reeves & Andi Choi
Phil Garrett & Ron Saks
Liz Roberts & The MINT Collective Family
Correy Parks & Quise Mays
Hakim Callwood & Chyna
Daniel Woodley & Donte Woods
Hana Mendel & Roman Cartagena
Tyler Davis, Lem Worrell & Reed Costello

None of this would have been possible without you guys, thank you so so much.

Directors cut of a promotional video created in an effort to revamp and revitalize the Lonsdale London athletic wear brand. 

2015 WINNER, Golden Addy, American Advertising Federation Awards (Columbus)

CREATIVE DIRECTION
Ben Inmon

GAFFER
Collins Laatsch 

KEY GRIP

STARRING
